title: ASK US ABOUT a TOUR! >> New Fixtures, Luxury Amenities
posting_body: ['Enjoy The Good Life...', 'Welcome Home!', 'Seize your chance to live in The Irvington, one of the most iconic apartment communities in Portland, OR.', 'The Irvington', 'show contact info', '1532 NE 21st Avenue', 'Portland OR 97232', 'Bed: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Rent: 1599', 'SQFT: 700', 'Your home is your castle and a place to unwind and relax.', 'The Irvington offers something for everyone.', 'See our available amenities to find something that speaks to you.', 'Get a sneak peek of the good life here at The Irvington.', 'Our Walk Score of 87 makes us as a "Very Walkable" location and our Bike Score of 100 makes us a "Biker\'s Paradise".', 'Rest assured, you can explore the area and nearby Portland with or without a car.', "Live next-door to the heart of Portland's hustle and bustle!", "Our community offers you the very best of the city from the peaceful confines of the historic Irvington and Sullivan's Gulch neighborhoods.", "If you just need to get away and enjoy the city's offerings, explore all of the shopping, dining, and entertainment that nearby downtown Portland has to offer!", 'Our Amenities', 'Alarm System', 'Gated Covered or Uncovered Parking*', 'Interior Parcel Lockers and mail boxes', 'FREE Bike Storage', 'Maple Soft-Close Cabinets', 'Kitchen Island that doubles as a Breakfast Bar', 'Private Deck / Patio with Living Room and Bedroom Access', 'All New Brushed Nickel Lighting, Fixtures, and Hardware', 'Elevator Access to Floors 2-6', 'Full Tub/Shower, Lighted Mirror w/ LED lighting', 'Abundant Closet Space Throughout', 'Floor to Ceiling Windows', 'Light Oak Hardwood Floors in All Living Areas', 'Private Exterior Storage Closet', 'Convenient Laundry Facility in Building', 'Historic Irvington Neighborhood', 'New Carpet in the Bedroom', 'Professionally Managed by Princeton Property Management', 'The Irvington provides residents with roomy one-bedroom apartment floor plans with modern design and filled with closets, so you can find the home that fits your lifestyle for years to come.', 'We offer our residents a myriad of top-notch amenities to make life that much easier so that you have more time to kick back.', 'Got some downtime and need to unwind?', 'If you want somewhere serene to clear your head, you need look no further than our smoke-free community with long private balconies, gated off-street parking, free bike storage, and parcel lockers.', 'At The Irvington, we get that life can sometimes get hectic, busy, or just downright stressful.', 'With easy access to I-84 and I-5, The Irvington is just minutes away from Downtown Portland and The Pearl District.']
